result.title: Method/cirruculum to follow practicing for IOI?
result.content:
Hello everyone,

Unlike the norm, we have no structured schedule/training for IOI-ers in my country, and I feel really lost when I come to practice â€” picking random Codeforces problems and trying to solve them doesn't feel like an optimal use of time.

You can guess my level by my cf rating and previous IOI performance. Do you have any resources/suggestions/practice groups that wouldn't mind me joining them? Or maybe we can create such a group?

Thanks!
